body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: read a report and complete a table.
identify graphs that show the same information as tables.
listen and group approximations according to whether the figures have been rounded up or down or are general approximations.
complete sentences with adverbs that draw the reader's attention to interesting facts and figures.
complete a report with signpost expressions.
write a report based on a table.
correct mistakes in a sample report.
